General.Name: Mydas Real Estate Investments Ltd
General.Description: Mydas Real Estate Investmens Ltd, formerly known as Mydas Investment Fund Ltd., owns and operates retirement homes and hotels. Mydas Investment Fund Ltd. was formerly known as Spancrete (1990) Ltd. Mydas Real Estate Investmens Ltd is based in Soreq Valley, Israel.
General.Address: 2 Raoul Wallenberg Street, Tel Aviv, Israel
